DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy volunteer age 2040 year 2 . Physical status I accord American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) classification 3 . No history nervous psychiatric disease 4 . Normal audiogram study 5 . No chronic consume analgesic , anticoagulant and/or antiplatelet agent , sedative alcohol 6 . No local infection site acupuncture 7 . Volunteers give informed consent 1 . Pregnant nursing female . 2 . History peripheral neuropathy 3 . Abnormal skin condition ( infection , scar , psoriasis , eczema ) 4 . Inflamed site acupuncture within 1 week
